welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Williamstown! Known for its stunning New England scenery and vibrant cultural scene, we invite you to immerse yourself in all this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and discover the beauty of Williamstown!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at PHL, serving primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a variety of restaurants and shops.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The largest terminal at PHL, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: A newly renovated terminal with a focus on sustainability and technology.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection in different areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Millville Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Millville Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atlantic City International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Atlantic City International Airport serves all international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and has a variety of shops and restaurants for travelers to enjoy.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and has duty-free shopping and upscale dining options.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
